row.entry: Used to add a user as administrator for current group.
Used to add all devices under user to current group.
Used to find a group information by group name. NCC allows duplicated group name.
Used to find a group by administrator name.
Used to find a group by device ID associating to current group.
Used to remove a administrator by User ID from current group.
Used to remove all devices under user from current group.
Used to add or reset a parent group. The subscriber group supports only one parent group.

note.p: These actions are valid for internal purposes only. It is not accessible through the SM GUI for operators.
